products.title: Amazilia Lime Roman Blind
products.description: When harlequin are at their best, there really is no rival and this amazilia lime roman blind really is up there. Beautiful flowers, gorgeous humming birds, youll feel like youre in a tropical paradise. Whats more, the gorgeous golden lime tone adds zesty colour to your sur when harlequin are at their best, there really is no rival and this amazilia lime roman blind really is up there.

products.title: Capri Vision Paradise Green Day And Night Blind
products.description: Give your interior a burst of fresh colour with the capri vision paradise green day and night roller blind. Bright and cheerful, this blind will give visual appeal to your space as well as being a practical and versatile option for light control. Designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively, it can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst letting plenty of natural light shine through.

products.title: Etched Vine, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: Subtly elegant, the etched vine in eau de nil blends a pale aqua green background with delicate floral imagery in ivory greys and whites. The outcome is one of understated sophistication and will work as part of a classic dcor scheme. Mix the eau de nil with similar green tones in a living room for a relaxed and luxurious look and feel. Go for ivory walls and wooden floors, with a large coloured rug on top.

products.title: Maurice, Lime - Roman Blind
products.description: Build a space full of comfort and class with the maurice in lime, where a combination of fine, silky threads form a plush and downy blind for a luxury look. The reviving, muted green influence creates a fresh finish on lavishly textured cloth. Create a feeling of classic sophistication in your master bedroom by hanging the lime against walls painted in a soothing, silky satin. Draw out the hues of the blind by featuring olive, silver, and yellow hues in your bedlinen, rugs, and accessories.

products.title: Blomma Kiwi Roman Blind
products.description: With the look of a hand-painted design, the blomma kiwi roman blind carries a gentle look with it, dressed with magnificent fruity shapes and textured leafy stems. And with the fruity pattern, this blind looks best in fun family kitchens, where a light an airy feeling prevails with the look of a hand-painted design, the blomma kiwi roman blind carries a gentle look with it, dressed with magnificent fruity shapes and textured leafy stems.

The organic green colouring of the pattern adds a further natural touch to this design, making this an ideal choice for those of yo i see trees of green.

Tropical green complements bright teal, which accents soft duck egg, and so on, all tamed by subtle slate greys and gentle blacks. Create a tropical rainforest colour scheme in your master bedroom, whilst still maintaining an orthodox floral patterning as your base.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Lime High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Lime is one of the most calm and natural finishes in the kaleidoscope range. With a premium gloss finish attracting your eye to this soothing shade of green you have the perfect recipe for combining functionality and style in one truly modern piece. We love the colour contrast when lime is placed with a range of light woods. It could be anything from a pine dining table or kitchen worktops, to a coffee table or a thick wooden window sill.

products.title: Nova, Lime - Roman Blind
products.description: In vibrant, fruity green, the nova lime is a bold and dazzling piece that will liven up any room. The bright hue contrasts nicely with the softness of the texturing, making for a stylish and innovative blind. Inject a sense of fun into a child's bedroom by combining the lime with playful, illustrated wallpapers in complementary colours such as navy and cobalt blues or lemon yellows and zingy oranges.

products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. products.title: William Morris Willow Bough Vine Roller Blind
products.description: With its vibrant colours and intricate design, the willow bough vine roman blinds is certain to make a statement in any home. Part of their william morris range, in collaboration with the v&a, the willow is a popular theme amongst many of morris designs. The nature-inspire with its vibrant colours and intricate design, the willow bough vine roman blinds is certain to make a statement in any home.

products.title: Kent, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: Luscious in lime, the kent kiwi mixes a light, appetising hue with a deep pile fabric with a gorgeous chenille feel. The thick yet lightweight cloth, lined with a protective polycotton sateen, folds neatly into gentle drapes to form a perfect roman blind. Add a calming softness to the spare bedroom by centring your decor around the kiwi. Keep things light and airy by sticking to white walls and white and lime bedlinen and cushions.

products.title: Kent, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: A rich forest green, the kent green combines indoor luxury with outdoor hues. The deep feel and soft texture of the chenille-like cloth adds a gentle shimmer to this dark colour as the light hits it from different directions. Combined with the sumptuous layers of the roman blind style, this is a plush piece indeed. Dress your dining room in old-fashioned splendour by blending the green amongst patterned wallpaper, dark mahogany furniture, and cream accents.

products.title: Infusion Solar Lime Green Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. This subtle lime green shade envokes nature and brighter days - especially during darker winter months. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.
